an occasion when a person or group of people are ambushed: Several passers-by were killed in the ambush. Fear of ambush prevents the police from going to high-risk areas. lie/wait in ambush
to hide and wait for someone in order to attack them: The soldiers lay in ambush, their guns loaded.
